title: League of Legends just got me a job.
body:
So to begin, I'm only 18. I moved out of my parents place recently and moved about an hour away in order to find work bc where I used to live was a desert. Literally. 

I moved because of a job offer with Wells Fargo, guaranteed 6 week pay temp job. But unfortunately didn't last any more than 2 weeks. Ive been living off of it for about 3 weeks now but rent is due soon, so I went out in a suit/tie looking for work.

Almost everywhere I went to treated me like shit or with 0 interest. Save 1 but they told me to come back in 2 weeks...)

Then I came upon a local Honda dealership. I filled out the app, hoping maybe theyd see something special about me there.

The guy I interviewed with told me af ter 3 minutes of talking

"You play a lot of video games dont you?"

>>Waitwut.

Me: "Uhh... yeah. I do."

Guy: "What games do you play"

"LoL. Do you know about it?"
*pull out LoL RP+ AMEX card*

Guy: "Hang on a sec"

He then pulls out his phone takes a picture and sends it to someone. All I could think of was "waitwtfrudoinm8" then realized I had no $ in there anyways so it didnt matter. 

Well it turns out that someone was the store manager and after he saw the card he instantly hired me. Then I figure out interviewer and the manager were both huge league and WoW nerds, we talked about video games for 15 minutes and they decided to give me a shot when no one else would.

Thanks Rito.

replies.body:
Quick question tho. 

They said they wanna duo Q eventually.

If I feed do I get fired?

> Quick question tho. 
> 
> They said they wanna duo Q eventually.
> 
> If I feed do I get fired?

Yes and they tell you "Get gud scrub".

Make Rammus their mascot
gotta go fast
Haha, that's awesome! Grats on the job!

I actually just got hired at a local video game store because I play league as well
----
**During the interview:**

Store Manager: Alright, you seem like you are knowledgeable, but here is the most important question about working here.

Me: Alright?

Store Manager: Do you play MOBAs?

Me: Wut?

Store Manager: Like league or DOTA

Me: I play league.

Store Manager: Uh-huh *looks at clipboard* are you level thirty?

Me: Yes

Store Manager: Do you play ranked or have a ranked team?

Me: Sometimes and no

Store Manager: Who is your favorite champion?

Me: Garen

Store Manager: Alright so you top lane then, cool. Can you come in tomorrow at 4?

Me: Yes?

**End of story**

This is legitimately how it happened.

> I actually just got hired at a local video game store because I play league as well
> ----

Well there goes your 10+ years of studying in fancy colleges & university, just down the drain.
WOW, WTF this is so Weird ................
How do you think I felt after the interview was over?
Can you imagine your breaks? A quick bot match or somethin. JEALOUS SO JEALOUS!!! Congrats btw
I will think that life is just so weird. You never know whats coming up. All i want to said is WTF!
Funny how Riot responds immediately to anything praising them, and completely ignores posts about the Cassiopeia rework, the poor state of game balance, and the atrocious ping on the East coast.
yep east coast pings r def bad
Do they promote you to manager if your challenger?

That's awesome! 

You may end up seeing your next promotion requirements include: 
"Must be capable of coach team members (to Plat Tier on League)" 
"Must able to demo strong team work and team communications (via 5v5 ranked game)"
Video game nerds helping each others, nice
Nerds Unite ! :P
Awesome man. 10/10 would read again.  Also I'm pretty sure if you duo and feed you can start applying other places. Hahahaha.

EH?


Eh? 



no? oooooo....
It's an auto dealership, not NASA. Anyone with decent people skills can qualify and if you can play League and admit to others that you play League, you probably have decent people skills.
I'm actually a manager at a new car dealership and also Plat...however I prob.  wouldn't hire you simply because you play League.  Id talk to you tho.

> I'm actually a manager at a new car dealership and also Plat...however I prob.  wouldn't hire you simply because you play League.  Id talk to you tho.

But then the guy would be like "No job? Then no talk >:("

When they look at you and say, "You play a lot of video games, don't you?" It means that its probably your appearance that's preventing you from getting a job. Grats on landing a sweet ass job with actually interesting co workers and bosses though.
Life needs to work like this more often.
Yea dude!! Grats on your new job! Have fun playing video games with your bosses!

Dang, maybe I should start carrying around some LoL swag when I go for interviews, lol!

Grats on the job!

$9/hour though


lol
OMG rito helps
Cool but as soon as a more qualified person applies, you are out of the fray regardless of who plays what, that doesn't move the company forward.
It's a Honda dealership, not NASA.

> Cool but as soon as a more qualified person applies, you are out of the fray regardless of who plays what, that doesn't move the company forward.

This really is the most dickish way one could possibly reply. Bravo. You did it.

Also, you'd be surprised at how much personality plays a factor in who gets hired. You could be the most qualified applicant in the bunch, but if your interviewer doesn't like or can't relate to you? You're *not* getting hired.

> Cool but as soon as a more qualified person applies, you are out of the fray regardless of who plays what, that doesn't move the company forward.
